entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
